{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DSL-2640U |revision=C2 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=DareGlobal |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6333;BCM6333KFBG; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25032BVSIG |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9812G6JH-6 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4312 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E;BCM5325EKGMG; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=ADSL2+ |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier w/ Power Detector;Sige;SE2527L;;1; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''Wireless ADSL Modem Router''' :[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dsl-2640u On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki]
*[[D-Link DSL-2640U rev C2]] :D-Link DSL-2640U/BRU/C2 :Chassis PCB: PWB:T0047713B-PL ([[DareGlobal]]) :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM6333KFBG :Flash: [[Atmel]] 26DF321 (SPI) or W25032BVSIG :RAM: ''Winbond'' W9812G6JH-6 (SDRAM) :Switch: [[Broadcom]] BCM5325EKGMG :Wi-Fi PA: [[Skyworks]] / ''Sige'' SE2527L ::(2.4GHz Power Amplifier w/ Power Detector)
